Seasoned software engineer and team lead specializing in GenAI, search, and scalable systems. I build RAG applications, AI agents, and hybrid search solutions using Python, TypeScript, Next.js, and modern frameworks.

As a consultant, I've delivered end-to-end GenAI projects for clients across industries. My background spans ad-tech, finance, and big data with deep expertise in Elasticsearch, OpenSearch, and LLM-powered applications.

Recent wins: Webby Award for "Human or Not" and Google AI Hackathon winner for "Tube Uni."

Available for GenAI consulting, partnerships, public speaking, and private workshops.

markdownRemark.html:
Had a fantastic time delivering an Advanced RAG Workshop at Astrix Security! This was a deep dive into building production-grade LLM applications with a focus on Retrieval-Augmented Generation techniques.

What We Covered

The workshop combined theory with hands-on experimentation, focusing on practical techniques teams can implement immediately:

  • Understanding embedding models and their trade-offs
  • Semantic vs. keyword search: when to use what
  • Vector database options and considerations
  • Chunking strategies beyond naive splitting
  • Hybrid search combining multiple retrieval methods
  • Experimenting with AWS Knowledgebase on real datasets

Thank You!

Big thanks to the Astrix Security team for hosting such an engaged and curious group! Looking forward to seeing what the team builds with these techniques!

Interested in hosting a similar workshop for your team? I offer customized RAG and GenAI workshops tailored to your specific use cases and technology stack. Reach out via LinkedIn to discuss!
